name: Vegas Games
overview: Vegas Games. discover the thrills and excitement of this premium collection of Keypunch's hit Vegas games. Stroll down the Vegas strip and enter the famous Casino de Luxe - where tensions run high and bank accounts low. Feel the heat of the game as you place your chips on the table and set the stakes. Will you win it all in the game of craps or lose your shirt in poker? Come, try your luck!
